full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 125 of 247 253 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross 1 Q. And that was 301 East 65th Street; right? 2 A. No, 301 -- well, 301 was the apartment. 66th Street, that address on 65th, which I want to say it was 116 or 114 East 65th Street -- 5 MR. EVERDELL: One moment, your Honor. 6 Q. Sorry. I'm going to correct myself. It was 116 East 65th Street? 7 8 A. There you go. That's correct. 9 Q. These are all the New York residences that you recall for Ghislaine; correct? 10 11 A. Yes, it is. 12 Q. These are all different residences than the residences that Epstein had as we discussed; isn't that right? 13 14 A. That's correct. 15 Q. And that's where you'd pick up Ghislaine's luggage from; right? 16 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. You wouldn't pick it up from one of Epstein's residences; right? 19 20 A. No, not unless I was picking up Jeffrey's luggage, I went to Mr. Epstein's residence. 21 22 Q. So at all times from 1991 to the 2000s, Ghislaine maintained a separate residence in New York from Mr. Epstein's; is that right? 23 24 25 A. Correct. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017487
